candidate_profile.name: Trần Thị Anh Thư
candidate_profile.role_focus: Data Analysis / Machine Learning / Network Security Engineer

projects.name: MACHINE LEARNING HEART DISEASE DATASET
projects.description: Predict Heart disease dataset. It includes statistical analysis, visualization, and feature evaluation, employing basic and ensemble learning models, as well as Feed Forward and Recurrent Neural Networks. Overfitting prevention techniques are used to improve model.

projects.name: COMPUTER NETWORK & NETWORK MANAGEMENT
projects.description: This project designs a small-scale network using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) for centralized update management. A secure network topology is created with routers and switches, while WSUS automates software updates to enhance security and efficiency. Active Directory and monitoring tools ensure reliable network management. The solution is scalable and suitable for small organizations.

projects.name: IT PROJECT ON DDOS ATTACK PREVENTION USING SOFTWARE-DEFINED NETWORKING (SDN)
projects.description: The IT project develops a DDoS attack detection solution for SDN networks, comparing machine learning techniques (e.g., KNN, Random Forest, XGBoost) to identify DDoS attacks by analyzing traffic anomalies in datasets representing normal and attacked network flows. Using Mininet to simulate network topology with multiple hosts and switches, the solution classifies traffic into normal, suspicious, and malicious categories to detect and mitigate DDoS attacks. Virtual machines running Ubuntu host simulations (e.g., h1, h2 for ping), with Mininet and iperf on Kali Linux used to detect traffic.

certifications.name: Fundamentals of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence
